text: The Department shall, in coordination with the Office of the Attorney General, submit 2 plans to the Council:
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2032(f) of Fiscal Year 2006 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2005 (D.C. Act 16-168, July 26, 2005, 52 DCR 7667).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-33, see notes following ยง 28-3901.

DC CODE ยง 28-3912

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A detailed plan for fiscal year 2006 on the steps that the Department shall take in providing consumer protection education in the District, including the dissemination of information regarding legal options through the Department and before the Office of the Attorney General and the Courts, to be submitted by September 1, 2005; and

A plan to fully implement this subchapter in fiscal year 2007, including any recommended amendments to this subchapter, to be submitted by February 1, 2006, in anticipation of the fiscal year 2007 budget.
